control.name: Implement procedures to secure access to physical premises
control.desc:
Establish (and implement as needed) procedures that allow the physical premises access (external and internal of a building(s)) in support of restoration of lost data under the disaster recovery plan and emergency mode operations plan in the event of an emergency.

Some common controls to prevent unauthorized physical access, tampering, and theft that covered entities shall be included as:

  • Locked doors, signs warning of restricted areas, surveillance cameras, alarms.
  • Property controls such as property control tags, engraving on equipment.
  • Personnel controls such as identification badges, visitor badges and/or escorts for large offices.
  • Private security service or patrol for the facility.

Facility security plan shall be reviewed periodically, especially when there are any significant changes in the environment or information systems.
